name: Rolondo
description:
ALSO AVAILABLE ON ANDROID HERE
Find me on twitter: @RadMcCoolGames

Play Rolondo, its got balls in it!

- Retro Inspired graphics
- Challenging level design
- Optional Challenges
- Controller Support

CONTROLS

Movement - arrow keys / WASD / left thumbstick

Jump - space bar / (A) / bottom face button

Comment if you want more levels or features.

Update01: changed a button image. added volume sliders.
Currently completely redoing the settings to be more suitable for PC.
